alert.note: Alert for Dale; Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 5:39AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Dale, southern Henry, eastern Geneva and Houston Counties in southeastern Alabama, Clay, Randolph, northwestern Calhoun, northwestern Early and northwestern Terrell Counties in southwestern Georgia through 730 AM EST/630 AM CST/... At 639 AM EST/539 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Lumpkin to near Geneva. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Cottonwood, Fort Gaines, Blakely, Cuthbert, Headland, Dothan, Geneva, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Slocomb, Cowarts, Edison, Webb, Shellman, Columbia and Pinckard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
